articles.title: Emergency plans in place for EU fuel rationing, says von der Leyen - The Irish Times
articles.description: Plans contain ‘the whole width of necessary steps’, says European Commission president

articles.title: Europe may need to return to coal as Russia reduces gas flows - CBC News
articles.description: Europe's biggest buyers of Russian gas raced to find alternative fuel supplies on Monday and could burn more coal to cope with reduced gas flows from Russia that threaten an energy crisis in winter if stores are not refilled.
articles.content: Europe's biggest buyers of Russian gas raced to find alternative fuel supplies on Monday and could burn more coal to cope with reduced gas flows from Russia that threaten an energy crisis in winter i… [+4718 chars]

articles.title: EU adds West African jihadists to sanctions blacklist - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: The European Union on Monday added three Al-Qaeda-linked jihadist commanders in West Africa to its terrorist sanctions blacklist for attacks in Mali and Burkina Faso.
articles.content:
The European Union on Monday added three Al-Qaeda-linked jihadist commanders in West Africa to its terrorist sanctions blacklist for attacks in Mali and Burkina Faso.

articles.title: 'Huge uncertainty' for EU firms over China's COVID-19 curbs, chamber warns - CNA
articles.description:
BEIJING: Many European firms are rethinking their investments in China because of its strict COVID-19 controls, a top business group said on Monday (Jun 20), warning that disruptions had pummelled operations.
